thread.section_title: WebsiteBox.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of WebsiteBox.com | websitebox.com
thread.title: Lenny Byrd

author: Lenny Byrd
title: Lenny Byrd
text: Wow! I am blown away with the ease of use of this website and the customer service is excellent. I just finished my on boarding session with Rabi and he was patient and led me through all of the steps I will need to take to customize the site to be unique for me and my needs. I look forward to getting it setup and having a site where my customers can search for homes through the MLS straight from my own portal. If you are looking for a great website at an extremely fair price then Websitebox is for you.
